column1: #text=As I was riding home from school one day the worst possible thing that could happen did happen .
#text=I knew I was in deep because I had no idea how to repair a flat bicycle tire .
#text=Luckily my grandfather did and with his advice we went to get a new tube for the rims of my bike 's tire .
#text=We arrive at the store and I am swamped .
#text=There are so many different kinds and sizes of tubes .
#text=Well luckily my grandfather had already looked before we had left and knew which kind we needed .
#text=With that in mind we purchased the one we needed and returned home ready to go .
#text=My grandfather showed me that to repair a tire you need to take off the old broken tube and the replace it with the new one .
#text=After that you take a pump and pump air into the tire until it is full .
#text=I was n't prepared last time for my tire to pop but you can be sure that I will be the next
